Description: This is a 3 level, 8 bedroom historic house with many amenities. It is a fully fenced, large corner lot with outdoor furniture. Comcast Alarm system and TV/internet paid by landlord. Windows have new energy saving pleated cell blinds. Two newer hot water heaters insure plenty of hot water any time of day. Perfect house for a group of sorority sisters, which is the group currently living there now.

If not needed, then these items are stored.
